name: EXOME
description:
It's up to you and your team to find the missing research team. You will stumble upon challenges and unimaginable predators. Suit up and choose your gear because you are going to expend every last bullet in order to make it to the end.


Explore the forest with your team. The smallest detail could be important to your mission.

  • Fully cooperative with up to 4 players
  • Single Player Mode
  • Horde AI System
  • Dynamic Difficulty
  • Weapon and Equipment Progression


Purchase weapons and equipment upgrades to increase your survivability.

  • Unreal Engine 5
  • Open Non-linear World
  • Character Customization
  • In-game Feedback Form


Use your equipment to give yourself the advantage against anything you may encounter.
